gene.function: FUNCTION: Adapter protein that provides a critical link between cell surface growth factor receptors and the Ras signaling pathway.; FUNCTION: Isoform 2 does not bind to phosphorylated epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) but inhibits EGF-induced transactivation of a RAS-responsive element. Isoform 2 acts as a dominant negative protein over GRB2 and by suppressing proliferative signals, may trigger active programmed cell death.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Nucleus {ECO:0000269|PubMed:21179510}. Cytoplasm {ECO:0000269|PubMed:21179510}. Endosome {ECO:0000269|PubMed:21179510}. Golgi apparatus {ECO:0000250}.
